subject: Hockey, Ice
Deaths (Fatalities)
lead_paragraph: Rick Rypien, who is a cousin of the former N.F.L. quarterback Mark Rypien, is the second active N.H.L. player found dead this off-season.
snippet: Rick Rypien, who is a cousin of the former N.F.L. quarterback Mark Rypien, is the second active N.H.L. player found dead this off-season.
